Circular element

Source: R/plot_fct.R
circfun.Rd

Create a list of x and y coordinates for a circle with a given number of slices.

Usage

circfun(nslice, n = 50)

Arguments

nslice

Number of slices in the circle

n

Total number of points in the circle

Value

A list of x and y coordinates per slice.

Examples


circfun(1)
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]]$x
#>  [1]  0.000000e+00  3.061617e-17 -6.393858e-02 -1.268273e-01 -1.876335e-01
#>  [6] -2.453588e-01 -2.990553e-01 -3.478413e-01 -3.909157e-01 -4.275714e-01
#> [11] -4.572063e-01 -4.793339e-01 -4.935909e-01 -4.997431e-01 -4.976896e-01
#> [16] -4.874640e-01 -4.692342e-01 -4.432997e-01 -4.100861e-01 -3.701390e-01
#> [21] -3.241142e-01 -2.727675e-01 -2.169419e-01 -1.575541e-01 -9.557931e-02
#> [26] -3.203511e-02  3.203511e-02  9.557931e-02  1.575541e-01  2.169419e-01
#> [31]  2.727675e-01  3.241142e-01  3.701390e-01  4.100861e-01  4.432997e-01
#> [36]  4.692342e-01  4.874640e-01  4.976896e-01  4.997431e-01  4.935909e-01
#> [41]  4.793339e-01  4.572063e-01  4.275714e-01  3.909157e-01  3.478413e-01
#> [46]  2.990553e-01  2.453588e-01  1.876335e-01  1.268273e-01  6.393858e-02
#> [51]  1.530808e-16
#> 
#> [[1]]$y
#>  [1] 0.500000000 0.000000000 0.004104993 0.016352568 0.036541621 0.064340648
#>  [7] 0.099293189 0.140825325 0.188255099 0.240803716 0.297608328 0.357736207
#> [13] 0.420200052 0.483974211 0.548011513 0.611260467 0.672682527 0.731269145
#> [19] 0.786058330 0.836150445 0.880722979 0.919044052 0.950484434 0.974527874
#> [25] 0.990779578 0.998972696 0.998972696 0.990779578 0.974527874 0.950484434
#> [31] 0.919044052 0.880722979 0.836150445 0.786058330 0.731269145 0.672682527

#> [49] 0.016352568 0.004104993 0.000000000

circfun(1, 10)
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]]$x
#>  [1]  0.000000e+00  3.061617e-17 -3.213938e-01 -4.924039e-01 -4.330127e-01
#>  [6] -1.710101e-01  1.710101e-01  4.330127e-01  4.924039e-01  3.213938e-01
#> [11]  1.530808e-16
#> 
#> [[1]]$y
#>  [1] 0.5000000 0.0000000 0.1169778 0.4131759 0.7500000 0.9698463 0.9698463
#>  [8] 0.7500000 0.4131759 0.1169778 0.0000000
#> 
#> 
circfun(4, 50)
